hey bill, will the next video be awesome?

     it is supposed to be

12.9.17  12:02 am   if someone puts grapes in a cloths drier will it make raisins?  

     why don't you try it and see

12.8.17  10:19 pm   are you breathing correctly and existing properly right now?

     i think so

12.8.17  10:11 pm   What's your favorite Bob Dylan quote?

     how about this

12.8.17  9:15 pm   what's the best birthday present ever?

     birth!

12.8.17  9:09 pm   any advice for final exams?

     try to figure out the answers

12.8.17  8:41 pm   Thank you. This honesty you portray has given me new vigor - especially reality. Please never remove it. You made me feel much better.

What features would you want to add to your website if you had the time to do so?

     there are more features that will be added in the future, but i can't tell you what they are

12.8.17  7:43 pm   Besides the final test view and uploading it, what was the very last step of completing the hotewig video? What was the very list thing you fixed or added or adjusted or whatever? 

     i don't remember, but there is a troubleshooting text file dated may 10, 2017 that just says:

pope actually crop


captions: cambodia, burma

12.8.17  6:40 pm   Can you please, please make a tutorial on how to use this webpage?

     i'd prefer it to be a surprise

12.8.17  6:38 pm   will next video contain shapes

     yes

12.8.17  6:01 pm   HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO KEEP MY COOL!?!?

     did you try writing your name on it

12.8.17  5:28 pm   What do you want for Christmas?

     a new year

12.8.17  5:19 pm   hey bill i asked you a question but i forgot what it was

      it was this

12.8.17  4:35 pm   do you have any private more serious songs?

     more serious than what

12.8.17  1:35 pm   Are you in fire?

     may be

12.8.17  12:29 pm   I can probably spend my whole life writing and rewriting and changing and editing just one song over and over. I think I'll have everything just the way I like it, but then I listen to it the next day and I hear it differently and want to add/change stuff. Do you have any advice on this? It's frustrating because it never feels like a song is finished, eventually I just have to move on to the next with lingering feelings about 'should I have used this sound here instead of that sound?' or 'should I have added this fill here' etc. 

     it's important to remember that every finished piece of work you have ever seen could have been improved much much more

12.8.17  12:17 pm   Do you think AI's will take over the world?

     no. A.I. will always be the name for something that doesn't exist yet

12.8.17  12:07 pm   What am ! doing with my life if I watch your videos?

     one of the things you are doing with your life is watching my videos. you are likely doing other things too, which i can't determine from your question

12.8.17  12:04 pm   you used a capital letter in the history of the entire world when "Europe" discovers the aztec and inca empires

     that makes sense

12.8.17  11:54 am   when you say something is rad does that mean its radioactive?

     not necessarily

12.8.17  11:36 am   how can i get people to join my revolution

     you could ask them politely, but it would also help if it's a good, high quality revolution

12.8.17  11:23 am   If you could be a lifeless object, what would you be?

     being a lifeless object does not require any attention. so you might say that you and i are every lifeless object at the same time

12.8.17  11:22 am   is mass a space that is kinda slow or is space some faster version of mass

     both ways seem plausible to me

12.8.17  11:22 am   What to do if people force you to do something you dont want to do?

     try to force them to do something they don't want to do

12.8.17  11:20 am   How can i tell if i love somebody?

     you'll just have to guess

12.8.17  11:20 am   Why is the future so scary?

     because anything can happen!

12.8.17  11:18 am   I want to be a good piano player but my hands are ridiculously small, i cant even play an octave from white to white...

     that's fine

12.8.17  11:09 am   What if somebody declares a war?

     then i think there is a lot of paperwork

12.8.17  11:08 am   Is this seat taken?

     sorry which seat

12.8.17  10:56 am   12.7.17  5:20 pm would you say that you support him then?

     11.13.17 5:28 pm

12.8.17  10:21 am   How do you get over your anxiety?

     try to understand it

      Or do you just let it marinate in the back of your mind until it slowly consumes you?

     no

12.8.17  9:23 am   have you ever tried to make songs with weird time signatures? like 5/4 or 2/4 or anything?

     any time signature is part of my repertoire. the weirder ones usually only get used for transitions

12.8.17  8:52 am   why the fuck do you use month/day/year in your website? what's wrong with you?

     that's the way everyone does it in my country

12.8.17  8:47 am   was there anything you had to cut from the history of japan or the entire world?

     oh hell yeah

12.8.17  7:50 am   Why the hell is fidget spinners still a trend?

     i don't think they are

12.8.17  7:50 am   Gimme your lunch money 

     i was going to spend it on lunch

12.8.17  6:35 am   any thoughts of 2018?

     not yet

12.8.17  5:50 am   were you forced to sponsor chips or did you want to?

     they were fake chips, and it was a fake sponsorship. i made the whole thing up

12.8.17  5:39 am   when starting the bill wurtz project did you rely on anyone outside of yourself to make it to fruition?

     no

12.8.17  5:32 am   Do you get a lot of incomplete questions because someone just wanted to start a new paragraph by pressing enter, accidentally submitting the question? For example:

     it happens much less often than what used to happen before, which was several blank lines after the question

12.8.17  4:10 am   How the hell do you get the thread through the needle?

     i think you have to use camels

12.8.17  3:20 am   What is originality?

     doing something new and different

12.8.17  1:36 am   im on your random questions page and ive seen the same one twice and none from <2014

     i didn't start taking questions until 2015

12.8.17  1:31 am   is this question really a question

     i will run some tests

12.8.17  12:55 am   are you going to answer any questions tonight 

     yes

12.8.17  12:13 am   What's the best way to get over sickness?

     contemplate your life for a little while

12.7.17  11:19 pm   Why were you not featured in YouTube Rewind 2017 and 2016? Your videos and your channel were a big hit in those years.

     you will have to ask the creators of 'youtube rewind' which i was just informed is not me

12.7.17  11:17 pm   Have you ever wanted to do something, and then realize it was already done?

     i think so

     If so,and you are still passionate about doing the thing. What do you Do?

     the best strategy is to never search to see if someone has done something you thought of. if you do, you will probably find someone who has done it, which will cause you to chicken out unnecessarily

12.7.17  10:21 pm   how do you choose which song to make next?

     my latest system, which causes slightly less anxiety and confusion from my previous way, is to go through all the songs (probably about 400) and select all of them that i would be willing to do next, usually a list of about 20. then i panic for a few hours, then i use a random number selection to pick from amongst those, and then panic a little bit more, and then finish writing the song and make the song

12.7.17  8:50 pm   How are you so good with timing (like rhythmically in your music and timing/syncing of your videos)? Is one of your parents a clock? 

     no but there were clocks in my house, when i was young
